gameplayEngineer.headline: GAMEPLAY ENGINEER
gameplayEngineer.description: I build player-facing systems with an eye for feel and performance—from input to animation, from prototype to polish.

aiTools.headline: AI & TOOLS
aiTools.subheadline: Editor extensions. Node graphs. Generative pipelines.
aiTools.description: I ship tooling that helps teams move faster—custom nodes, asset pipelines, and AI-powered workflows that stay out of the way.

optimizedSystems.headline: OPTIMIZED SYSTEMS
optimizedSystems.description: Clean architecture, measurable performance, and netcode that stays stable under pressure—from prototype to production.

collaboration.headline: COLLABORATION
collaboration.description: I work best with designers, artists, and engineers—translating ideas into systems, reviewing code, and keeping the team unblocked.

projects.title: Selected Projects
projects.description: A collection of games, tools, and experiments from my GitHub and professional work. From AI tooling to multiplayer systems and VR experiences.

skills.title: Stack & Skills
skills.narrative: I specialize in gameplay systems and developer tools, with strong fluency in AI integration, multiplayer networking, and performance optimization.

contact.title: Let's build something.
contact.description: If you're hiring for gameplay, tools, or AI-related engineering—let's talk.
